exclusion: Enter the Exclusion Mode of the gateway, and press the tamper switch 3 times within 1.5s, then the Smoke Sensor will be removed after period of time.
inclusion: Enter the Inclusion Mode of the gateway, and press the tamper switch 3 times within 1.5s, then the Smoke Sensor will stay in enrolment state until successfully enrolled into network enrolment time out after 30s.
label: ES-61
overview:
ES61 is a battery powered independent photoelectric smoke sensor, mainly used for detecting surrounding smoke concentration. It will make loud audio alert when the concentration exceeds its alarm threshold, and send alarm signal to Control Panel at the same time.

Restore Factory Settings - press the anti-tamper switch for 6 times within 2.5 seconds to restore factory settings.
wakeup:
a) Manual Wake-up - Quickly press tamper switch once, the Smoke Sensor will automatically send wake-up information, and there will be 10s after wake-up to receive gateway setting information.

b) Automatic Wake-up - Default time of automatic wake-up is 24 hours, and there will be 10s after wake-up to receive gateway setting information. The max automatic report time = 24 hours, minimum = 30 min.

parameters.label: Basic Set
parameters.overview: If there is any device in Association Group 2 the PIR Sensor will send BASIC Set = Value command to control that deivce when the PIR is triggered.

parameters.label: Turn Off Light Time Configuration
parameters.description: send BASIC Set = Value command & send Basic Set = 0x00 to turn of light
parameters.overview: If there is any device in Association Group 2 the PIR Sensor will send BASIC Set = Value command to Group 2 and send Basic Set = 0x00 to turn of light after 5 x t seconds- Set value t means to send the BAsic Set command after t seconds.

parameters.label: PIR Sensor Alarm Elemination Time Configuration
parameters.overview: Min time is 5s. Eg If the config is 1, this means it will eliminate alarm after 1 * 5s = 5 seconds

associations.label: Lifeline
associations.description: Send "notification_Report" to the device in Life line group

associations.label: Basic Set Command
associations.overview:
When sensor is triggered:

[Command Class BAsic, Basic Set, Value = 0xFF(default 0xFF, configurable, see Config Parameters)

 

When light up timeout:

[Command Class BAsic, BAsic Set, Value =0x00]
